CONTENT: いつか そう いつか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Someday... Yes, someday,

CONTENT: 私にも 望まなくとも 満開の桜を見上げながら　春の道を行く日がやってくる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: yo también caminaré mientras miro cómo florecen los cerezos, quiera o no.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll be walking down a spring path while looking up at the cherry blossoms whether I want to or not.

CONTENT: 私は ごく普通の人間だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm a normal person.

CONTENT: 見えないものに 触れるような力はないし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tengo la habilidad de tocar lo que no veo
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't have the ability to touch something I can't see,

CONTENT: 目の前で起きていないことに 関与はできない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y no me involucro en lo que no pasa delante de mí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and I can't involve myself in something that's not happening right in front of me.

CONTENT: そんな私が怖いのは　しまむらが 私といない間に　知らないものに 変わってゆくこと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Lo que temo es que, mientras no mire, Shimamura se convierta en alguien diferente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What I'm scared of is while I'm not looking Shimamura will change into something different.

CONTENT: だから これからの私は　片ときも しまむらから 目を離さないでいようと決意する
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso he decidido pasar cada minuto libre mirándola.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I've made up my mind to spend every spare moment looking at Shimamura.

CONTENT: あのー 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Adachi.

CONTENT: 何? シュッ シュッ シュッ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes?

CONTENT: まあ いいや よっす しまーちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Never mind. Heyo, Shima!

CONTENT: おっ あだちっちーもいるぞちっちー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Adachicchi is with you, too. Chicchi!

CONTENT: 日野に永藤 何か久しぶり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Hino and Nagafuji. It's been a while.

CONTENT: ひさひさー うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It sure has!

CONTENT: 永藤 シャンプー変えた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you change your shampoo, Nagafuji?

CONTENT: ああ 昨日 日野んち泊まったから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que ayer me quedé en casa de Hino
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, I spent the night at Hino's place yesterday,

CONTENT: おまけに 朝 お風呂も へえー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y me he bañado allí esta mañana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and took a bath there this morning. Huh...?

CONTENT: お前ね そういう話は 今度でいいんだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye, no hacía falta que lo contaras.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Look, you don't really have to talk about that now.

CONTENT: ほら 私達の番だぞ はーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come on, it's our turn. Okay.

CONTENT: シュッ シュッ シュッ 頑張れよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good luck out there.

CONTENT: 相手の家に泊まる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Staying at someone's house...

CONTENT: 泊まって お風呂に入って そのまま学校に行く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: usar su baño y venir al insti...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then using their bath and then heading right to school...

CONTENT: わっ! 私も行っていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Can I come over, too?

CONTENT: はあ? 泊まりに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? And spend the night.

CONTENT: うん? 日野の家に?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Uh, at Hino's place?

CONTENT: し... しまむらの家!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Your place, Shimamura.

CONTENT: 何で? うっ その...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why? Well, uh...

CONTENT: 泊まるって ウチのお風呂狭いよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, our bathtub's tiny.

CONTENT: 別に お風呂はどうでも...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't really care about the bath.

CONTENT: どうでもいいか? いや よくない気もする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿O sí? Creo que sí que importa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, do I? No, I think it does matter...

CONTENT: よくないよな お風呂
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe it does matter...

CONTENT: 安達? あっ　どうでもいいけど でも 泊まりたい!　うーん どうして?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Adachi? Eso da igual. Solo quiero quedarme a dormir. Pero ¿por qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi? That doesn't really matter... But I want to spend the night! But why?

CONTENT: し... しまむらと 仲よくなりたいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Porque quiero estar cerca de ti, Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-Because I want to be closer to you, Shimamura...

CONTENT: 仲悪いの? そいつは知らなかったぜ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No somos ya bastante cercanas? No tenía ni idea.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are we not close already? I had no idea.

CONTENT: あっ いいよ いい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, we are, we are!

CONTENT: と思うけど　もっとなりたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think... But I want to be closer.

CONTENT: 泊まると 仲よくなるのかなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Y crees que lo vas a conseguir durmiendo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do you get closer by spending the night, though?

CONTENT: まっ いいか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, whatever.

CONTENT: うーーーあ... 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A-Adachi?

CONTENT: 泊まりの相談という名目で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Con la excusa de pasar la noche
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Under the pretense of discussing me spending the night,

CONTENT: 放課後に しまむらと寄り道　すごい お泊まりすごい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: he podido salir con Shimamura después del insti. Va a ser la leche.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I got to hang out with Shimamura after school... Wow. Spending the night is awesome.

CONTENT: じゃあね 今週の土日のどっちかにウチ来る?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces... ¿Quieres venirte el sábado o el domingo?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So... Do you want to come over to my place this Saturday or Sunday?

CONTENT: れ... 連休 連泊
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Los dos días con sus dos noches...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: T-Two days off... And spending the night two nights...

CONTENT: そんなに 長々と泊まりたいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You want to stay at my place that long?

CONTENT: 言っておくけど ウチ 旅館じゃないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Que sepas que mi casa no es una pensión.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just so you know, my place isn't an inn.

CONTENT: あっ バイトは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about work?

CONTENT: バイトは行く えっと しまむらの家から
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Iré a trabajar desde tu casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll go to work... um, from your place.

CONTENT: ふむふむ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Mm-hm.

CONTENT: まっ 帰ったら もう一人いそうだし ハハハ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque seguro que habrá más gente cuando lleguemos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though there's probably going to be one more when we get to my place.

CONTENT: 何だろうねー　最近 妹が 2人にも3人にもなった感じだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No sé por qué, pero parece como si tuviera dos o tres hermanas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure why, but it feels like I have two or three little sisters now.

CONTENT: 私も?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You mean me, too?

CONTENT: 妹かあ 島村桜
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her little sister... Shimamura Sakura.

CONTENT: 韻でも踏んでいるみたいだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's like an alliteration.

CONTENT: 友達よりは ずっと距離が近くて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'd be even closer than friends then,

CONTENT: それは いいのだけれど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and that part's fine...

CONTENT: はあ... 近くなりすぎて　見てもらえないところが 増えてしまいそうだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que cuanto más me acerque, menos se daría cuenta de mi presencia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But then I think we'd get too close and she'd notice me even less.

CONTENT: 買うものは これと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: He apuntado lo que tengo que comprar...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Change of underwear Socks 4? 5? PJs Food: Bread & Instant ramen\" Here's all the stuff I'll need to buy...

CONTENT: あとは しまむらを退屈させないように　遊ぶものを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo me queda asegurarme de que Shimamura no se aburre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And then, I just need something to make sure Shimamura doesn't get bored.

CONTENT: あれはない うーん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, that's not going to work.

CONTENT: どうしてもやることがなかったら一緒にテレビでも見ればいいのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si no tenemos nada que hacer, acabaremos viendo la tele juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If we can't think of anything to do, I guess we can just watch TV together.

CONTENT: もしかしたら この前みたいに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe, just maybe...

CONTENT: 同じことになって　今度は 逃げないでいられるだろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si ocurre lo mismo, espero no salir corriendo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The same thing will happen and hopefully, I won't run away again.

CONTENT: 逃げないぞーー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not going to run away!

CONTENT: お... おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: G-Good morning...

CONTENT: その... っていうか　荷物多くない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye... Creo que vas muy cargada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You know... Uh... You seem to have a lot of stuff.

CONTENT: 何か 引っ越しみたいになってない?　大げさだなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sabes que no te mudas, ¿verdad? Es demasiado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You do realize you're not moving, right? It's a bit much.

CONTENT: そうかな あと 早くない?　ふあ... まだ 8時だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eso crees? Además, ¿no es un poco temprano? Solo son las ocho.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You think so? Also, aren't you early? It's still 8 AM.

CONTENT: ご... ごめん 寝てた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: S-Sorry. Were you sleeping?

CONTENT: うん 起こされた ごめん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, me has despertado. Lo siento.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup, you woke me up. Sorry.

CONTENT: あっ 別にいいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Eh, it's fine.

CONTENT: 安達って時間厳守なとこあるよね 偉いね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Siempre eres muy puntual y eso es bueno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're always so punctual, Adachi. That's good.

CONTENT: 本当は 7時に来てたけど さすがに早すぎると思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La verdad es que llegué a las siete, pero supuse que era muy temprano.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was actually here at 7 AM, but I figured that was a bit too early.

CONTENT: この辺を自転車で ウロウロしてたとは言えない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No le puedo decir que llevo una hora dando vueltas en la bici.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't tell her I was just wandering around on my bike for an hour.

CONTENT: うん 不思議なところは それぐらいかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's probably the only weird part of this, so...

CONTENT: じゃあ 改めて いらっしゃい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, welcome.

CONTENT: どうぞ そ... それじゃ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come in. Th-Thanks...

CONTENT: お姉ちゃんの友達 覚えてるでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You remember my friend, don't you?

CONTENT: お... お邪魔します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-Hi...

CONTENT: ど... どうも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-Hi...

CONTENT: む... いい子仮面かぶってるな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's being a good girl today.

CONTENT: 2階の部屋でいい?　というか そこしか空いてないんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te viene bien el cuarto de arriba? Es el único que tenemos libre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is the room upstairs okay? Or well... That's the only open room we have.

CONTENT: あれ? 2階嫌い?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh? Did you not want to go upstairs?

CONTENT: そうじゃないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not exactly...

CONTENT: しまむらと 同じ部屋じゃないんだなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Parece que no voy a quedarme en tu habitación...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess I won't be staying in the same room as you...

CONTENT: 一緒の部屋がいいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You want to stay in the same room as me?

CONTENT: うーん 私はいいけど　多分 妹が嫌がると思うから ごめんね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A mí me da igual, pero creo que a mi hermana no, perdona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm fine with it, but I don't think my little sister will like that. Sorry.

CONTENT: 何もかも 思いどおりにいくわけない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era imposible que saliera como planeaba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There was no way this was all going to go as I planned.

CONTENT: しまむらだって 自分の部屋に 私を寝泊まりさせるのは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No estoy segura de si le gustaría que me quedara en su habitación.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure if Shimamura's okay with me staying in her room...

CONTENT: 私はいいけど 妹が嫌がると思うから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A mí me da igual, pero creo que a mi hermana no, perdona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm fine with it, but I don't think my little sister will like that.

CONTENT: 私はいいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A mí me da igual, a mí me da igual...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm fine with it... I'm fine with it...

CONTENT: いいのか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Or maybe she is!

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes?

CONTENT: 朝ご飯どうする? 食べてきた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do you want to do for breakfast? Did you already eat?

CONTENT: あ... 大丈夫 用意してきたから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No te preocupes, he venido preparada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't worry. I came prepared.

CONTENT: ヘイヘイヘーイ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, hey, hey...

CONTENT: あら 私の飯は食べられませんと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Lo que he preparado no es de tu gusto?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? My cooking's not good enough for you?

CONTENT: あ... いえ　いただきます ありがとうございます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, no. I'll have some. Thank you very much...

CONTENT: 召し上がれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dig in.

CONTENT: 安達ちゃんは ウチのと違って　真面目に 学校通っているんでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, Adachi, tú sí que parece que vas al insti, no como mi hija.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, Adachi, you probably actually go to school unlike this daughter of mine.

CONTENT: いえ あの...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, I, uh...

CONTENT: 安達も似た感じだよ そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi es igual que yo. ¿Ah, sí?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi's in the same boat. Oh, really?

CONTENT: おとなしそうで いい子に見えるけどね　ウチの不良娘よりは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues parece tímida y buena, no como esta delincuente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She looks like a nice, quiet girl, unlike my delinquent over here.

CONTENT: うるさいな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, shut up.

CONTENT: しまむらは 私よりずっと すっごくいい子です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura es más buena que yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura's more of a good girl than I am.

CONTENT: いい子? プッ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Good girl...?

CONTENT: アハハハ なるほど　安達ちゃんの方が お姉さんなわけか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. Seguro que tú eres mayor que ella.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. So you must be older, Adachi.

CONTENT: それはない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not true.

CONTENT: ごちそうさまー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks for the grub.

CONTENT: どうぞー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come in.

CONTENT: えっと 怒った?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, are you mad?

CONTENT: 何がー? ああ さっきの　ウチの母親 いつもあんな感じだし　怒るだけムダ アッハハ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué? ¿Por lo de antes? Mi madre es así, no tiene sentido enfadarme.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: About what? Oh, earlier? My mom's always like that, so there's no point in getting mad.

CONTENT: そういう人間関係なんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's just how their relationship is.

CONTENT: それより 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: More importantly, Adachi...

CONTENT: さて 何をしようかね? あっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What should we do now?

CONTENT: 休日が 特別なものに感じられたのは　いつの日以来だろうか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuánto tiempo hace que no siento que los días libres eran tan especiales?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder how long it's been since I was able to feel that days off were actually special?

CONTENT: 昨日のお泊まり初日は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ayer fue el primer día que me quedé,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yesterday, the first day I stayed over,

CONTENT: 本当に何もないまま 終わってしまった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: really did end with nothing happening.

CONTENT: じゃ... じゃあ 行ってくるね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well, I'll see you later.

CONTENT: 行ってらっしゃーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Have a good day!

CONTENT: 行ってきます
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks.

CONTENT: 本当に しまむらと特別なことは 何も起きなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No ha pasado nada especial con Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nothing special with Shimamura actually happened.

CONTENT: ただ 一緒にいただけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nada más que pasamos tiempo juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We were just there together.

CONTENT: ただ一緒にというのは　ある種 私の理想かもしれないけれど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede que estar con ella sea lo ideal, pero...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just being with her might just be ideal to me, but...

CONTENT: けれど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But...

CONTENT: が... 頑張るぞー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I'm going to do my best!

CONTENT: うむ 頑張りなされ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, you do that.

CONTENT: しまむらが笑ってくれた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura laughed.

CONTENT: 今日は いい日なのかもしれない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede que hoy vaya a ser un buen día.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Today might be a good day after all.

CONTENT: あっ でも 昨日は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But then again,

CONTENT: 全然 何にもなかったって わけでもなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: it's not like absolutely nothing happened yesterday.

CONTENT: そうでもなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not exactly.

CONTENT: 抱月 さっさと お風呂入りなさいよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hogetsu, hurry up, and take a bath.

CONTENT: あんた おなか膨れると すぐ寝るから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vas a dormirte con el estómago lleno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You go right to bed whenever you get full.

CONTENT: はいはい そうですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, yeah, sure.

CONTENT: ごちそうさま でした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you for the meal...

CONTENT: しまむらの部屋は 1階にあるのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿También has traído eso? -Su cuarto está en la primera planta,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Really? You brought that, too? Shimamura's room is on the first floor,

CONTENT: 自然と 私の方に来てくれたのが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but she naturally came to my room.

CONTENT: 何だか無性に嬉しくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That made me so happy.

CONTENT: 誰かには知らないけど 優越感すらあった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me sentí superior, aunque no sabía a quién.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not exactly towards who, but I felt superior towards them.

CONTENT: だから...　あのときの私は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, at that moment...

CONTENT: 少し大胆になって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I got a little bold.

CONTENT: 足の間 その...　座っていい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Can I... um, sit between your legs?

CONTENT: この前みたいに 走って逃げ出さないならね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, siempre y cuando no huyas esta vez.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: As long as you don't run away this time.

CONTENT: はい どうぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here you go.

CONTENT: えっ あ... う... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Okay, sure.

CONTENT: そ... それじゃあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: D-Don't mind if I do...
